title: Scheduled Maintenance Table

body.body: Odometer Reading in Miles (km) or Time Period, whichever comes first
Engine and oil cooler – check for leaks
Fuel system – check for leaks, chafing etc.
Autoscan – carry out a full Autoscan using the Triumph diagnostic tool (print a customer copy)
ABS modulator – check for stored DTCs
Every three years, regardless of mileage
Wheel bearings – check for wear/smooth operation
Wheels – check wheels for broken or damaged spokes and check spoke tightness (if fitted)
Lights, instruments and electrical systems – check
Brake master cylinders – check for fluid leaks
Brake calipers – check for fluid leaks and seized pistons
Every two years, regardless of mileage
Bank angle indicators – inspect visually for wear
Accessory rack sliding carriage – check for correct operation ‡
Accessory pannier link mechanism – check for correct operation and adjustment ‡
Carry out all outstanding service bulletin and warranty work
Complete the service record book and reset the service indicator
* Evaporative system fitted to models for certain markets only.

metadata.products: CF7; CE7; CX7; CB7; CT7; CS7; CR7; CN7; CM7; CG7
